long_description: The Trigger Point Performance Cold roller offers myofascial release and cold compression at the same time, making it a fast and effective recovery product. Place in freezer for 2 or more hrs., wipe down with warm washcloth to remove frost, and begin rolling with light pressure to allow muscles to adjust. Cold Roller maintains cold effectiveness for up to 3 hrs. thanks to the patent-pending gel core and stainless-steel construction. Polyurethane wheels offer easy rolling. Use to massage your quadriceps, hamstrings, IT bands, calves and other muscle groups. The Trigger Point Performance Cold roller is meant to be used continuously; do not stop rolling while using.
